title: Monster
description:
From Tenderfoot TV and HowStuffWorks, 'Monster: The Zodiac Killer' dives into one of the most notorious, unsolved serial killing sprees in history. Despite sketches, cyphers and taunting letters to the press, the question still remains: who is the Zodiac?

While you're here, don't forget to listen to Season 1, 'Atlanta Monster', which tells the true story of one of Atlanta’s darkest secrets, almost 40 years later.
author: iHeartRadio & Tenderfoot TV

items.title: S2 Trailer:  Monster: The Zodiac Killer
items.description: Who is the Zodiac and where is he?   Season 2 launches January 3, 2019.

items.title: S1 Bonus: The Sheriff
items.description: Why is Sidney Dorsey so important to this case?  What role did he have in the Atlanta Child Murders, and why is he in a Georgia Prison?

items.title: S1 Bonus: The Night Shift
items.description: Recalling Wayne's time working as a stringer... under the cover of night.

items.title: S1 Bonus: Live from CrimeCon
items.description: Live from CrimeCon 2018, Payne Lindsey and team take you inside the hit podcasts Atlanta Monster and Up and Vanished. Moderated by HowStuffWorks’ Jason Hoch.

items.title: S1 Bonus: Live from SXSW
items.description: Live from the TuneIn stage at SXSW, the team gives a behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Atlanta Monster. Moderated by Tracy Kaplan.

items.title: S1 Bonus: Questions: Part 2
items.description: Payne and the team answer more listener questions.

items.title: S1 Bonus: Questions: Part 1
items.description: Payne and the team answer listener questions.

items.title: S1 E10: Loose Ends
items.description: In this case, the truth depends on who you choose to believe.

items.title: S1 E9: The Trial
items.description: Trial by trace evidence

items.title: S1 Bonus: The List
items.description: One thing is clear -- no one can agree on The List.

items.title: S1 E8: CIA
items.description: What car did Wayne really drive? Where did the reward money go? And was Wayne scouted by the CIA?

items.title: S1 Bonus: The Vault
items.description: The team behind Atlanta Monster digs deeper into untold stories

items.title: S1 E7: Conspiracy?
items.description: Payne explores theories of Klan involvement within the case.

items.title: S1 E6: The Splash
items.description: Payne and the team gear up for a closer look at the so-called "bridge incident."

items.title: S1 E5: Wayne's World
items.description: Payne makes contact with the alleged Atlanta Monster.

items.title: S1 E4: Gemini
items.description: Wayne Williams through the eyes of those seemingly closest to him...

items.title: S1 E3: Atlanta Monster Seized
items.description: Atlanta asks, who is Wayne Williams?

items.title: S1 E2: Manhunt
items.description: Atlanta’s search for a serial killer becomes more and more convoluted.

items.title: S1 E1: Boogeyman
items.description: It's 1979 in Atlanta - and children are going missing.

items.title: S1 Preview: Missing Darron Glass
items.description: On September 14, 1980, Darron Glass went missing.

items.title: S1 Trailer: Atlanta Monster
items.description: Hysteria hits as kids disappear from their own neighborhoods.
